review: I have issues with Hulu Plus on it. It takes a long time to load and freezes frequently where I have to start over from home. Netflix seems to work ok but is not really for someone who likes to watch TV because it's mostly movies. Haven't tried the Amazon Prime yet. The sticks were easy to set up. We bought 2 at the same time. One continues to go haywire and we have to unplug, reboot, and start all over. The other one doesn't have that problem at all. For the price, you get what you pay for. After the initial investment we cut our TV bill from $95.00 to $17.00 a month for both Netflix and Hulu Plus. Worth the value if you don't mind some bugs.
author: Donna Paoletti

review: Talk about your one-stop shop when it comes to entertainment. You can use Fire Stick for Netflix, Hulu Plus, Showtime Anytime, Pandora, ESPN, games, music and so much more. This is a great buy promising to provide endless hours of entertainment.
author: Dabney Struble

review: I didn't know had to pay for most of the best apps.
author: Elvin M.

review: Generally, this is a pretty slick little piece of tech, but I have to knock it down from 5 to 3 stars because when I watch video, either on Netflix or Amazon Prime, it goes black every few minutes for a second or two. Sometimes the video picks up, but other times I have to hit play again as it will act as though I hit the pause button. This makes it really distracting and I've gone back to my PS3 for watching videos. I've tried rebooting the unit and it has had no effect. I tend to think it must be a flaw in the stick as it happens with both services.
